```{r 4data}
N <- 1000
x_1 <- rnorm(N)
alpha <- 1.0
gamma_1 <- 1.0
gamma_2 <- 1.0
x_2 <- alpha * x_1 + rnorm(N)
y <- gamma_1 * x_1 + gamma_2 * x_2 + rnorm(N)
lm(y ~ x_1)
```


```{r 4data-2}
post_treatment <- function(N, alpha, gamma_1, gamma_2){
  x_1 <- rnorm(N)
  x_2 <- alpha * x_1 + rnorm(N)
  y <- gamma_1 * x_1 + gamma_2 * x_2 + rnorm(N)
  lm(y ~ x_1)
}
```

```{r 4data-3}
post_treatment(1000, 1, 1, 1)
```


### (a)

```{r 4a}
post_treatment(1000, 1, 0, 1)
post_treatment(1000, 1, 1, 0)
```
